title: paripAlisau nIyenna
sahitya:
paripAlisau nIyenna paripari moreyADuvavanu paripAliso nIyenna


anupallavi

  cirakAlada pApavella kaLeya balla guru nimage sari 
      samAnarillavendu karava mugisiddenE


caraNam    vara tungA tIradali mereva karuNa surabhiye guriya mADi 
stutisi hADi baDavanAta krpaye mADi salaho sundara rAghavEndra
